messages.message: Congratulations, you're on the right track.
Oops...you've been doing well, careful you don't slip!
Getting better, but still needs improvement...stay with it!
Be careful...things are getting worse...consider contacting your coach for tips on how to turn it around.
Still need to get back in the saddle.  Maybe your coach can help?
Great work...keep up the energy, don't stop now!
You've been doing great for quite a while! Excellent work!
You've been having trouble for a while now...can your coach help?
Still needs work, but definitely getting better! Keep it up!
Looks like things have really slowed down...can your coach help?
Looks like you've been stuck for a while. Reach out to your coach for help, that's what we're here for!

docs.json: This file is used by notifications script, defines notification messages based on team performance states and conditions.

states.ok: OK: The team is doing great
states.mok: MORE OK: The team has been doing great for a while now
states.nok: NOT OK: The team is doing poorly
states.mnok: MORE NOT OK: The team has been doing poorly for a while now
